history.proof: intros a b c d H1 H2. hauto use: Rplus_assoc, Rplus_le_lt_compat, Rplus_comm.

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c, d : R H1 : a + c < d H2 : b <= c Unable to unify "a + c < d" with "a + b + c < c + d".

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall r1 r2 r3 : R, 0 <= r2 -> r1 + r2 < r3 -> r1 < r3 a, b, c, d : R H1 : a + c < d H2 : b <= c Unable to unify "b <= c" with "a + b + c < c + d".

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H0 : forall r1 r2 r3 : R, 0 <= r2 -> r1 + r2 < r3 -> r1 < r3 a, b, c, d : R H1 : a + c < d H2 : b <= c Unable to unify "a + c < d" with "a + b + c < c + d".

original: intros a b c d H1 H2. apply (Rplus_lt_reg_pos_r (a + c) c d). apply H2. apply H1.
